start.text: Times of war are upon us..
Reactor is hot. We're ready for battle.

start_boss.text: This shall be our finest hour.
My staff and I are ready.

retreat.text: Flag staff has advised a retreat.

out_of_missiles.text: Weapons control reports no more missiles.

engaged.text: We'll make short work out of them.
Gunnery, you are free to engage!

need_help.text: We need support as soon as possible.

hull_90.text: My Chief Engineer is reporting battle damage.

hull_50.text: My Chief engineer is urging a retreat.
Damage control teams Alpha through Charlie, report to engineering. Delta to Foxtrot, stay on the hull.
*Cough!* Get that fire out! We're not done yet!

hull_30.text: We've been severely damaged. Requesting to disengage.
My ship's spine is starting to buckle!
My bridge has taken a direct hit!
Crew causalities are mounting! This combat is unsustainable!

overload.text: The reactor can't keep up with this!

victory.text: A captain's work is never done..
